scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase serve --only functions
scripts.wintest: set FIREBASE_CONFIG=dummy && set GCLOUD_PROJECT=dummy && jest -c unit_test_jest.config.js
scripts.e2e: npm run build && firebase emulators:exec --only functions,firestore "jest --detectOpenHandles ./test/end2end.test.ts"
scripts.device: npm run build && firebase emulators:exec --only functions,firestore "cd ../app && flutter drive --target=test_driver/emulator.dart"
scripts.emulator: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only firestore,functions
